mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mafcdb.BANK_STATEMENT (BankName, FileName, MAFC_Acct, Balance, Sap_Acct) VALUES (#{bankName, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acct, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapAcct, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
